edu.umn.biomedicus.tnt

Interface WordProbabilityModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KnownWordProbabilityModel, SuffixWordProbabilityModel

    public WordProbabilityModel

    Interface for word probability models.

    • Method Detail

      • logProbabilityOfWord

        double logProbabilityOfWord()

        Convenience method for #logProbabilityOfWord(edu.umn.biomedicus.syntax.tnt.models.WordPosCap). Constructs a new WordPosCap from the arguments.

        Returns:
        a negative double representing the log10 probability of the word

      • getCandidates

        java.util.Set<edu.umn.biomedicus.common.types.syntax.PartOfSpeech> getCandidates()

        Returns the potential part of speech candidates for a given word

        Returns:
        a set of PartOfSpeech enum values

      • isKnown

        boolean isKnown()

        Given a word, returns if this model can account for its probability.

        Returns:
        true if this model can provide a probability for the word, false otherwise

      • openDataStore

        Loads the data from a map db database.

        Writes the data to a MapDB database.

        Gets the identifier for this word probability model

        Sets the integer identifier for this word probability model.
